code: import httpService from"./httpService";import{apiUrl}from"../config.json";import{openNotification}from"../components/custom";export function getOrder(){return httpService.get(apiUrl+"order");}export function Order(data){return httpService.post(apiUrl+"order/add",data).then(function(res){if(res.data.status===200){window.location.reload();}else if(res.data.status===404){openNotification("error","Tabel already reserved","Check Info ");}});}export function DelteOrder(data){return httpService.delete(apiUrl+"order/delete/".concat(data)).then(function(res){if(res.data.status===200){window.location.reload();}});}export function updateOrder(data){return httpService.put(apiUrl+"order/update",data).then(function(res){if(res.data.status===200){window.location.reload();}});}
